title: Genesis Gaming Presents Social Casino Focused Product Line at G2E
text:
On the heels of recent announcements in the Social Casino market, Genesis Gaming is unveiling its offerings and strategy at the preeminent show for the gaming-entertainment industry. For the first time, Genesis Gaming will exhibit at the Global Gaming Expo (G2E) at the Las Vegas Sands Expo & Convention Center, Sept. 29-Oct. 1. Genesis will be located in the iGaming zone, booth #5425. Genesis will showcase a wide range of slot titles for both social and real money online gaming, all on an array of mobile devices.
In the booth, Genesis is showcasing two video slot games:
Machine Gun Unicorn - 5 Reel, 10 Line game with two way pay.
Bier Fest - 5 Reel, 25 Line video slot game featuring multiple base game features.
“We established our studio as a designer of unique and innovative slots, and these two showcase games represent the latest trends. Both Bier Fest and Machine Gun Unicorn provide fun, fast-paced game play perfect for mobile users,” said Scott Sims, Head of Global Design at Genesis Gaming. “Machine Gun Unicorn introduces a new game mechanic, Symbol Bombs, which we knew would be ideal for mobile play due to the high frequency and simplicity of the feature. Bier Fest keeps the frequent feature hits on the main reels, but with a variety of features and the addition of a deeper, second-screen bonus.”
These two games were released recently in Europe for real-money iGaming to great success and are being offered to US-based social casinos in a unique G2E show promotion.
A key industry slot provider since 2008, Genesis Gaming recently announced a focus in the USA market for social casinos. G2E is the unveiling of a new line of video slots, the Vegas Line, tailored for the American social casino market.
According to Eilers Research, Social casino games market generated TEN TIMES more revenues than the U.S. iGaming (real money) market. Eilers Research gaming analyst Adam Krejcik estimates the expanding social casino phenomenon in the U.S. will eclipse $2.7 billion in revenue this year.
“Our strategy in the United States has been to combine our land-based design experience and our past experience as white label supplier to a top tier social casino, to become a leading supplier of social casino content.” said Geoffrey Hansen, Managing Director. “Our unique value proposition is this experience combined with our portfolio depth and ability to provide these games in compelling mobile formats. We are well positioned to provide operators and platforms with the content that can drive Social Casino growth.”
